Question
========

The following is an indication of 5 individuals as to how they are ranked in terms of authoritarian behavior and social status:______________. Authoritarian behavior: 3, 2, 4, 1, 5. Social status: 1, 4, 5, 2, 3. The value of the Spearman correlation coefficient here is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.218
* 0.3
* 0.4
* 0.7

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.218: Incorrect
* 0.3: Correct
* 0.4: Incorrect
* 0.7: Incorrect
